CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Foredragsdato__c), NULL, MAX( 0, IF( ISBLANK(Closed_Date__c), TODAY() - Foredragsdato__c, DATEVALUE(Closed_Date__c) - Foredragsdato__c ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculates the days between Foredragsdato and Closed Date. If Closed Date is not yet set, it uses "TODAY" instead. Cannot go below 0.
CustomField.label: Days to Close (Lecture)
